communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dear FOIA Officer,

Under the Freedom of Information Act (5 U.S.C. 552), I request access to and copies of all records, including but not limited to electronic records, emails, correspondence, meeting notes, and other communications involving Mike Cernovich, Jack Posobiec, and any career or political officials within the Department of State during the administration of President Donald Trump (January 20, 2017, to January 20, 2021).

Please include all relevant documents that detail communications, meetings, and correspondences with these individuals, as well as any notes, agendas, or mentions of them in communications with Department of State officials. I am interested in understanding the nature and extent of their interactions with the Department of State during this period.

I understand that there may be fees for this request and would appreciate it if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. Please notify me prior to your incurring any expenses in excess of $1000.

If my request is denied in whole or part, I ask that you justify all deletions by reference to specific exemptions of the act. I will also expect you to release all segregable portions of otherwise exempt material. I reserve the right to appeal your decision to withhold any information or to deny a waiver of fees.

As I am making this request in the public interest, for the purpose of disseminating information regarding the public activities and operations of the U.S. Department of State to the general public, I request that you waive any fees associated with the processing of this request.

Please respond to this request within 20 business days, as outlined by the statute. Thank you for your consideration of this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dear Information and Privacy Coordinator,

Under the Freedom of Information Act (5 U.S.C. 552), I am requesting access to and copies of all records, including but not limited to, electronic records, emails, correspondence, calendar entries, meeting notes, and any other forms of communications from the date of their cessation of employment to the present, involving any contacts between Jacqueline Lopour and Andrew Trabulsi (both former employees of the CIA and currently employed by Alphabet) and any personnel at the Central Intelligence Agency.

Please include any records pertaining to meetings, phone calls, emails, and any other forms of communication with either Jacqueline Lopour or Andrew Trabulsi. I am particularly interested in communications that occurred after their employment with the CIA, as part of their roles at Alphabet.

I understand that there may be fees for this request and would appreciate it if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. Please notify me prior to your incurring any expenses in excess of $1000.

If my request is denied in whole or part, I ask that you justify all deletions by reference to specific exemptions of the act. I will also expect you to release all segregable portions of otherwise exempt material. I reserve the right to appeal your decision to withhold any information or to deny a waiver of fees.

As I am making this request in the public interest, for the purpose of disseminating information regarding public activities and operations of the Central Intelligence Agency to the general public, I request that you waive any fees associated with the processing of this request.

Please respond to this request within 20 business days, as outlined by the statute. Thank you for your consideration of this request.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Untitled
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Under the Freedom of Information Act (5 U.S.C. 552), I am requesting access to and copies of all records, including but not limited to, electronic records, emails, correspondence, calendar entries, meeting notes, and any other communications from January 1, [Start Year] to the present, concerning any communications and contacts between Natalia Chefer (in her role as Managing Director of DE Shaw, please include any aliases or misspellings) and any personnel at the U.S. Department of the Treasury.

Please include any available records related to meetings, phone calls, emails, and any other form of communication with Natalia Chefer. Additionally, I request any documents or communications that mention Natalia Chefer in discussions, memos, proposals, briefing materials, or other types of correspondence, especially in the context of her role at DE Shaw.

I understand that there may be fees for this request and would appreciate it if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. Please notify me prior to your incurring any expenses in excess of $[amount].

If my request is denied in whole or part, I ask that you justify all deletions by reference to specific exemptions of the act. I will also expect you to release all segregable portions of otherwise exempt material. I reserve the right to appeal your decision to withhold any information or to deny a waiver of fees.

As I am making this request in the public interest, for the purpose of disseminating information regarding public activities and operations of the Department of the Treasury to the general public, I request that you waive any fees associated with the processing of this request.

Please respond to this request within 20 business days, as outlined by the statute. Thank you for your consideration of this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis

title: Natalia Chefer Communications With the SEC

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Natalia Chefer Communications With the SEC
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Under the Freedom of Information Act (5 U.S.C. 552), I am requesting access to and copies of all records, including but not limited to, electronic records, emails, correspondence, calendar entries, meeting notes, and any other communications from January 1, [Start Year] to the present, pertaining to any communications and contacts between Natalia Chefer of DE Shaw (please include any aliases or misspellings) and any personnel at the Securities and Exchange Commission.

Please include any available records related to meetings, phone calls, emails, and any other form of communication with Natalia Chefer. Additionally, I request any documents or communications that mention Natalia Chefer in discussions, memos, proposals, briefing materials, or other types of correspondence.

I understand that there may be fees for this request and would appreciate it if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. Please notify me prior to your incurring any expenses in excess of $[amount].

I will also expect you to release all segregable portions of otherwise exempt material. I reserve the right to appeal your decision to withhold any information or to deny a waiver of fees.

As I am making this request in the public interest, for the purpose of disseminating information regarding public activities and operations of the SEC to the general public, I request that you waive any fees associated with the processing of this request.

Please respond to this request within 20 business days, as outlined by the statute. Thank you for your consideration of this request.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Trevor Davis
